exerciseActions.requestManualFeedbackTooltip: Send a manual feedback request before the due date for review.
exerciseActions.requestAutomaticFeedbackTooltip: AI-Based Feedback can include mistakes. Consider checking important information.
exerciseActions.resumeExerciseError: Error trying to resume the exercise

practiceMode.title: Practice Mode
practiceMode.explanation: The practice mode allows you to keep working on the exercise after the submission due date for self-practice. This will not affect your grading! Artemis will setup a separate repository for you to clone as usual.
practiceMode.repositoryChoice: You already have a graded participation from before the due date. Therefore you can choose if the code in the separate repository should be the template repository of this exercise or your graded participation.

resetRepository.label: Reset Repository
resetRepository.explanation: You can reset your repository back to its initial state and start working again from there. This will override any changes you made so far! But the submitted changes will remain in the history.
resetRepository.offlineIDEExplanation: After you reset the repository you have to pull the changes on your local machine in order to start working again.
resetRepository.repositoryChoice: You already have a graded participation from before the due date. Therefore you can choose if you want to reset your practice repository to the template of this exercise or the code of your graded participation.
resetRepository.questionGraded: Are you sure you want to reset the graded repository of exercise {{ title }}?
resetRepository.questionPractice: Are you sure you want to reset the practice repository of exercise {{ title }}?
resetRepository.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the exercise to confirm.
resetRepository.success: Resetting repository was successful. You can start over now.

exerciseActions.practiceModeTooltip: The practice mode allows you to keep working on the exercise after the submission due date for self-practice. This will not affect your grading! Artemis will setup a separate repository for you to clone.
exerciseActions.cloneRatedRepository: Clone your repository for this exercise:
exerciseActions.clonePracticeRepository: Clone your practice repository for this exercise:
exerciseActions.cloneExerciseRepository: Clone a repository for this exercise

cloneSourceTree.helpIcon: This opens the repository in Sourcetree or Tower. If you do not have them, you can still clone the repository using your IDE or terminal.

ideButton.helpIcon: IDE can be defined in the settings

exerciseActions.sshKeyTip: To use ssh, you need to add an ssh key to your account {link:here}.
exerciseActions.vcsTokenTip: To access the repository with a VCS access token, you need to add a new one to your account {link:here}.
exerciseActions.vcsTokenExpiredTip: Your VCS access token has expired. Renew it {link:here}.
exerciseActions.startExerciseBeforeStartDate: You cannot participate before the start date of the exercise.
exerciseActions.deleteMultipleExercisesQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete the selected exercises?
